table.caption: Red Wizards Renown
rows: You know the locations of Thayan enclaves around Faer√ªn and can enter and stay in them, providing you a {@book Comfortable|XPHB|6|Lifestyle Expenses} lifestyle for free.

You can buy the following kinds of adventuring gear from Thayan merchants at half cost: Arcane Focus, Ink, Ink Pen, Paper, Parchment, {@item Potion of Healing|XDMG}, and {@item Spell Scroll|XDMG} (cantrip or level 1).
The first time your Renown Score reaches 10, the Red Wizards give you an Uncommon magic item from the Rod, Staff, or Wand category.
You have Advantage on ability checks made to influence a creature while bartering to buy or sell a magic item.
You gain access to a tattoo artist who can ink {@item Thayan Spell Tattoo|FRHoF|Thayan Spell Tattoos} on your body (see {@area "Tattoo Magic"|3ba|x} below).
The first time your Renown Score reaches 30, the Red Wizards give you a Rare magic item from the Rod, Staff, Wand, or Wondrous Item category.

When preparing to cast a Circle spell (see {@area chapter 5|2f4|x}) in a town or larger settlement, you can recruit {@dice 1d4} {@creature Mage|XMM|Mages} to assist you for free. The mages arrive in {@dice 1d10} days. Once you use this reward, you can't do so again until your Renown Score increases.
The first time your Renown Score reaches 50, the Red Wizards give you a Very Rare magic item from the Rod, Staff, Wand, or Wondrous Item category.
